verses.verse: And after <S%H310><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> there arose <S%H6965><s%> to defend <S%H3467><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> Tola <S%H8439><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Puah, <S%H6312><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Dodo, <S%H1734><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of Issachar; <S%H3485><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Shamir <S%H8069><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>

And he judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and died, <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in Shamir. <S%H8069><s%>

And after <S%H310><s%> him arose <S%H6965><s%> Jair, <S%H2971><s%> a Gileadite, <S%H1569><s%> and judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And he had <S%H1961><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> that rode <S%H7392><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> ass colts, <S%H5895><s%> and they had thirty <S%H7970><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> which are called <S%H7121><s%> Havoth-jair <S%H2334><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are in the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>
And Jair <S%H2971><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in Camon. <S%H7056><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> Baalim, <S%H1168><s%> and Ashtaroth, <S%H6252><s%> and the gods <S%H430><s%> of Syria, <S%H758><s%> and the gods <S%H430><s%> of Zidon, <S%H6721><s%> and the gods <S%H430><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and the gods <S%H430><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and the gods <S%H430><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and forsook <S%H5800><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> him.

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was hot <S%H2734><s%> against Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and he sold <S%H4376><s%> them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon. <S%H5983><s%>

And that <S%H1931><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> they vexed <S%H7492><s%> and oppressed <S%H7533><s%> <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> eighteen <S%H8083><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>

Moreover the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> against Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and against Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> and against the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ephraim; <S%H669><s%> so that Israel <S%H3478><s%> was sore <S%H3966><s%> distressed. <S%H3334><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H2199><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> We have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against thee, both because <S%H3588><s%> we have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> <S%H853><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> and also served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> Baalim. <S%H1168><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H3413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Did not <S%H3808><s%> I deliver you from the Egyptians, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> and from <S%H4480><s%> the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and from <S%H4480><s%> the Philistines? <S%H6430><s%>

The Zidonians <S%H6722><s%> also, and the Amalekites, <S%H6002><s%> and the Maonites, <S%H4584><s%> did oppress <S%H3905><s%> you; and ye cried <S%H6817><s%> to <S%H413><s%> me, and I delivered <S%H3467><s%> you out of their hand. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%>

Yet ye <S%H859><s%> have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me, and served <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods: <S%H430><s%> wherefore <S%H3651><s%> I will deliver <S%H3467><s%> you no <S%H3808><s%> more. <S%H3254><s%>

Go <S%H1980><s%> and cry <S%H2199><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye have chosen; <S%H977><s%> let them <S%H1992><s%> deliver <S%H3467><s%> you in the time <S%H6256><s%> of your tribulation. <S%H6869><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> We have sinned: <S%H2398><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> unto us whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> seemeth good <S%H2896><s%> unto <S%H5869><s%> thee; deliver <S%H5337><s%> us only, <S%H389><s%> we pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And they put away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H853><s%> the strange <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> them, and served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and his soul <S%H5315><s%> was grieved <S%H7114><s%> for the misery <S%H5999><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Then the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> were gathered together, <S%H6817><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Gilead. <S%H1568><s%> And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> assembled themselves together, <S%H622><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Mizpeh. <S%H4709><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> and princes <S%H8269><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to <S%H413><s%> another, <S%H7453><s%> What <S%H4310><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is he that <S%H834><s%> will begin <S%H2490><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon? <S%H5983><s%> he shall be <S%H1961><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> over all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>
